title: Quantum Matrix Spherical Functions
summary: A general theory of matrix-spherical functions for dual Hopf algebras and right coideal subalgebras is developed. We establish their existence and define their orthogonality relations. When specialized to Kolb and Letzter's quantum symmetric pair coideal subalgebras, we associate, to each classical commutative triple, a unique corresponding quantum commutative triple. This leads to families of vector-valued orthogonal polynomials, which diagonalize a commutative algebra of difference-reflection operators and are invariant under sending $q \mapsto q^{-1}$. Various examples of these vector-valued orthogonal polynomials are given and identified with Intermediate Macdonald polynomials

AI.tldr: 本文为对偶Hopf代数和右余理想子代数发展了矩阵球函数的普适理论，建立了存在性和正交关系，并将结果应用于量子对称对余理想子代数，得到向量值正交多项式族。
AI.motivation: 研究对偶Hopf代数和余理想子代数背景下的矩阵球函数理论，为量子对称对理论提供数学基础，并探索与向量值正交多项式的联系。
AI.method: 发展对偶Hopf代数和右余理想子代数的矩阵球函数一般理论，证明存在性并定义正交关系；将理论应用于Kolb和Letzter的量子对称对余理想子代数，建立经典交换三元组与量子交换三元组的对应关系。
AI.result: 建立了矩阵球函数的存在性和正交关系；为每个经典交换三元组关联了唯一的量子交换三元组；得到了一族向量值正交多项式，这些多项式能对角化差-反射算子的交换代数，且在q→q⁻¹变换下保持不变。
AI.conclusion: 本文为对偶Hopf代数和余理想子代数建立了矩阵球函数的普适理论，并将其应用于量子对称对，得到了与Intermediate Macdonald多项式相关的向量值正交多项式族。

title: Degenerate Addition Formulas of the KP hierarchy and Applications
summary: It is well known that tau functions of the KP hierarchy satisfy addition formulas. We consider the general addition formula in the determinant form and take a certain limit of it. It expresses certain shifts of a tau function in terms of the Wronskian determinants of wave functions at various values of the spectral parameter. As an application the relation between solutions created by vertex operators and those created by Darboux transformations is clarified. As another application the new addition formula for Riemann's theta functions of Riemann surfaces is obtained by considering theta function solutions of the KP hierarchy. This addition formula is different from any of formulas in Fay's book.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了KP层次τ函数的加法公式，通过行列式形式的通用加法公式取极限，得到用不同谱参数下波函数的Wronski行列式表示τ函数特定平移的表达式，并应用于阐明顶点算子解与达布变换解的关系，以及推导黎曼曲面θ函数的新加法公式。
AI.motivation: 研究KP层次τ函数的加法公式，特别是通过极限方法从通用加法公式推导新的表达式，旨在建立顶点算子解与达布变换解之间的联系，并为黎曼曲面的θ函数发现不同于Fay书中已有公式的新加法公式。
AI.method: 采用行列式形式的通用加法公式，通过取特定极限，得到用不同谱参数下波函数的Wronski行列式表示τ函数特定平移的表达式。将此方法应用于KP层次的θ函数解，推导黎曼曲面θ函数的新加法公式。
AI.result: 成功推导出τ函数特定平移的表达式，阐明了顶点算子解与达布变换解之间的关系，并获得了黎曼曲面θ函数的新加法公式，该公式不同于Fay书中已有的任何公式。
AI.conclusion: 通过极限方法从KP层次τ函数的通用加法公式出发，建立了τ函数平移的Wronski行列式表示，揭示了顶点算子与达布变换解的联系，并为黎曼θ函数提供了新的加法公式，扩展了相关理论的应用范围。

title: Algebraic Obstructions and the Collapse of Elementary Structure in the Kronecker Problem
comment: 25 pages, 3 tables, submitted to Advances in Mathematics
summary:
While Kronecker coefficients $g(λ,μ,ν)$ with bounded rows are polynomial-time computable via lattice-point methods, no explicit closed-form formulas have been obtained for genuinely three-row cases in the 87 years since Murnaghan's foundational work. This paper provides such formulas for the first time and identifies a universal structural boundary at parameter value 5 where elementary combinatorial patterns collapse.
  We analyze two independent families of genuinely three-row coefficients and establish that for $k \leq 4$, the formulas exhibit elementary structure: oscillation bounds follow the triangular-Hogben pattern, and polynomial expressions factor completely over $\mathbb{Z}$. At the critical threshold $k=5$, this structure collapses: the triangular pattern fails, and algebraic obstructions -- irreducible quadratic factors with negative discriminant -- emerge.
  We develop integer forcing, a proof technique exploiting the tension between continuous asymptotics and discrete integrality. As concrete results, we prove that $g((n,n,1)^3) = 2 - (n \mod 2)$ for all $n \geq 3$ -- the first explicit formula for a genuinely three-row Kronecker coefficient -- derive five explicit polynomial formulas for staircase-hook coefficients, and verify Saxl's conjecture for 132 three-row partitions.

AI.tldr: 首次为真正三行Kronecker系数提供显式闭式公式，发现参数值5处的结构边界，其中基本组合模式崩溃。
AI.motivation: Kronecker系数$g(λ,μ,ν)$在有界行的情况下可通过格点方法多项式时间计算，但自Murnaghan基础工作87年来，从未获得真正三行情况的显式闭式公式。
AI.method: 分析两个独立的真正三行系数族，开发整数强制证明技术，利用连续渐近与离散整数性之间的张力。
AI.result: 证明$g((n,n,1)^3) = 2 - (n \mod 2)$（首个真正三行Kronecker系数显式公式），推导五个阶梯钩系数的多项式公式，验证132个三行分区的Saxl猜想。
AI.conclusion: 在参数值5处存在普遍结构边界：当$k \leq 4$时公式呈现基本结构（三角-Hogben模式振荡界，多项式在$\mathbb{Z}$上完全分解），在$k=5$时该结构崩溃（三角模式失效，出现不可约二次因子）。

title: Replicated algebras derived equivalent to higher Auslander algebras of type A
summary: We show that every higher Auslander algebra $A_{n+1}^d$ of type $\mathbb{A}$ such that $\gcd(n,d)=1$ is derived equivalent to a certain replicated algebra $B=B_0^{(n+d)}$. Moreover ${\rm{gldim}} B = nd$ and $B$ admits an $nd$-cluster tilting subcategory consisting of all direct sums of projective modules and injective modules. We introduce a class of algebras called $2$-subhomogeneous $m$-representation finite to characterize the homological properties of $B$ and give a method to obtain derived equivalences between fractionally Calabi-Yau algebras and $2$-subhomogeneous algebras using certain tilting complexes.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了当gcd(n,d)=1时，A型高阶Auslander代数A_{n+1}^d与复制代数B=B_0^{(n+d)}导出等价，且B具有gldim=nd并包含由投射模和入射模直和构成的nd-丛倾斜子范畴。
AI.motivation: 研究高阶Auslander代数的导出等价性及其同调性质，特别是当gcd(n,d)=1时的特殊结构，旨在建立这类代数与其他代数类之间的联系。
AI.method: 引入2-次齐次m-表示有限代数类来描述B的同调性质，并利用特定倾斜复形建立分数Calabi-Yau代数与2-次齐次代数之间的导出等价方法。
AI.result: 证明了A_{n+1}^d与B=B_0^{(n+d)}导出等价，B的整体维数为nd，且存在由投射模和入射模直和构成的nd-丛倾斜子范畴。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入2-次齐次m-表示有限代数类，为分数Calabi-Yau代数与2-次齐次代数之间的导出等价提供了系统方法，深化了对高阶Auslander代数同调性质的理解。

title: Lie groupoids, the Satake compactification and the tempered dual, I: The Satake groupoid
summary: The (maximal) Satake compactification associated to a real reductive group $G$ is the closure of the symmetric space of all maximal compact subgroups of $G$ within the compact space of all closed subgroups of $G$. We shall present three different views of a groupoid that may be associated to the Satake compactification. To begin, we shall define our Satake groupoid, as we shall call it, as a topological groupoid, and as a special case of a general construction of Omar Mohsen. Then we shall give a Lie-theoretic account of the Satake groupoid, borrowing from work of Toshio Oshima. Finally we shall identify the Satake groupoid with the purely geometric $b$-groupoid of the Satake compactification, using the structure of the compactification as a smooth manifold with corners. In a subsequent paper we shall use the Satake groupoid to present a new proof of Harish-Chandra's principle, that all the tempered irreducible representations of $G$ may be constructed from discrete series representations using parabolic induction.

AI.tldr: 本文从三个不同视角研究Satake紧化的群胚结构：作为拓扑群胚、李理论描述和几何b-群胚，为后续证明Harish-Chandra原理奠定基础。
AI.motivation: 研究实约化群G的Satake紧化的群胚结构，为理解该紧化的代数、几何和表示论性质提供统一框架，并为后续证明Harish-Chandra的tempered表示构造原理做准备。
AI.method: 1. 作为拓扑群胚：基于Omar Mohsen的一般构造定义Satake群胚；2. 李理论视角：借鉴Toshio Oshima的工作给出李代数描述；3. 几何视角：利用Satake紧化作为带角光滑流形的结构，将其识别为b-群胚。
AI.result: 建立了Satake紧化的三种等价群胚描述：拓扑群胚结构、李理论刻画和几何b-群胚实现，为紧化提供了统一的代数-几何框架。
AI.conclusion: Satake紧化具有丰富的群胚结构，可从拓扑、李理论和几何三个角度理解，这一框架将为后续证明Harish-Chandra的tempered表示构造原理提供基础工具。

title: Lie groupoids, the Satake compactification and the tempered dual, II: The Harish-Chandra principle
summary: We give a geometric account of Harish-Chandra's principle that a tempered irreducible representation of a real reductive group is either square-integrable modulo center, or embeddable in a representation that is parabolically induced from such a representation. Our approach uses the Satake compactification, an associated groupoid that was constructed in the first paper of this series, and its $C^*$-algebra.

AI.tldr: 该论文从几何角度解释了Harish-Chandra原理：实约化群的tempered不可约表示要么模中心平方可积，要么可嵌入到由这种表示抛物诱导的表示中。
AI.motivation: 为Harish-Chandra关于实约化群tempered不可约表示的分类原理提供几何解释，使用Satake紧化和相关代数结构来重新理解这一经典结果。
AI.method: 采用几何方法，利用Satake紧化、系列论文第一篇中构造的相关群胚及其C*代数来分析表示理论问题。
AI.result: 成功从几何角度重新阐释了Harish-Chandra原理，建立了表示理论与几何结构之间的新联系，为理解tempered表示提供了新的视角。
AI.conclusion: 几何方法为Harish-Chandra的表示分类原理提供了新的理解框架，Satake紧化和相关代数结构是分析实约化群tempered表示的有效工具。

title: Differential graded algebras with divided powers and homotopy Lie algebras
summary: Given a commutative ring $R$ and a quotient module $R/\mathfrak{m}$, we study the structure of differential graded algebra with divided powers that the resolution of $R/\mathfrak{m}$ can possess. We provide a construction of such a resolution by making use of symmetric tensors, which does not require a Noetherian assumption on $R$. We then apply those results to study the homotopy Lie algebra associated to a the pair $(R,R/\mathfrak{m})$, and then investigate in more details the complete intersection case.

AI.tldr: 研究交换环R及其商模R/m的微分分次代数结构，构造不依赖诺特假设的对称张量分解，应用于同伦李代数和完全交情形分析
AI.motivation: 研究交换环R及其商模R/m的微分分次代数结构，特别是具有除幂结构的分解，为研究同伦李代数提供代数工具
AI.method: 利用对称张量构造R/m的分解，该方法不要求R是诺特环，然后应用于研究(R,R/m)对的同伦李代数结构
AI.result: 提供了不依赖诺特假设的分解构造方法，并成功应用于同伦李代数的研究，特别对完全交情形进行了详细分析
AI.conclusion: 通过对称张量方法构造了R/m的微分分次代数分解，为研究同伦李代数提供了有效工具，特别在完全交情形下获得了深入的结构理解

title: Geometric realizations of Ringel-Hall algebras of continuous quivers of type $A$
summary: Lusztig introduced the geometric realizations of quantum groups associated to finite quivers and defined their canonical bases. Sala and Schiffmann introduced the Ringel-Hall algebra of line and realized it as the direct limit of Ringel-Hall algebras of finite quivers of type $A$. In this paper, we shall give geometric realizations of Ringel-Hall algebras of continuous quivers of type $A$ via the geometric realizations of Lusztig by using the method of approximation given by Sala and Schiffmann.

AI.tldr: 本文通过Sala和Schiffmann的近似方法，利用Lusztig的几何实现，给出了A型连续箭图的Ringel-Hall代数的几何实现。
AI.motivation: Lusztig为有限箭图的量子群引入了几何实现并定义了其典范基。Sala和Schiffmann引入了线箭图的Ringel-Hall代数，并将其实现为A型有限箭图的Ringel-Hall代数的直接极限。本文旨在将这两种理论结合起来。
AI.method: 采用Sala和Schiffmann提出的近似方法，利用Lusztig为有限箭图量子群建立的几何实现技术，将其推广到A型连续箭图的Ringel-Hall代数。
AI.result: 成功实现了A型连续箭图的Ringel-Hall代数的几何构造，将Lusztig的几何实现方法从有限箭图推广到连续箭图情形。
AI.conclusion: 通过结合Lusztig的几何实现和Sala-Schiffmann的近似方法，本文为A型连续箭图的Ringel-Hall代数提供了几何实现，扩展了相关理论的应用范围。

title: Residues of Rankin-Selberg Zeta integrals and the split non-tempered Gan-Gross-Prasad conjectures
summary: We construct a regularization of the Rankin-Selberg period on general linear groups for non-tempered automorphic representations using residues of Zeta integrals. We prove that it satisfies the global non-tempered Gan-Gross-Prasad conjecture and its Ichino-Ikeda refinement. We also build a local version of our regularization and show that it defines a non-zero invariant linear form on non-tempered representations. Combined with previous works of Chan, Chen and Chen, this settles the conjectures over local fields of characteristic zero.

AI.tldr: 本文通过zeta积分的留数构造了一般线性群上非调和自守表示的Rankin-Selberg周期的正则化，证明了其满足全局非调和Gan-Gross-Prasad猜想及其Ichino-Ikeda细化，并建立了局部版本的正则化形式。
AI.motivation: 研究非调和自守表示在Rankin-Selberg周期上的正则化问题，解决非调和情形下的Gan-Gross-Prasad猜想及其细化，填补特征零局部域上相关猜想证明的空白。
AI.method: 利用zeta积分的留数构造一般线性群上Rankin-Selberg周期的正则化，建立全局和局部两个版本的正则化方法，并与Chan、Chen等人的先前工作相结合。
AI.result: 成功构造了非调和自守表示的正则化Rankin-Selberg周期，证明了其满足全局非调和Gan-Gross-Prasad猜想及其Ichino-Ikeda细化，局部正则化形式在非调和表示上定义了非零不变线性形式。
AI.conclusion: 结合Chan、Chen等人的工作，本文结果完全解决了特征零局部域上的Gan-Gross-Prasad猜想及其细化，为非调和自守表示理论提供了重要的正则化工具和理论框架。

title: On a question of Auslander and Bridger on 2-reflexive modules
summary: We answer a question raised by Auslander and Bridger by showing that not every 2-reflexive module is reflexive.

AI.tldr: 本文通过构造反例，证明了并非所有2-自反模都是自反模，回答了Auslander和Bridger提出的问题。
AI.motivation: Auslander和Bridger曾提出一个问题：是否所有2-自反模都是自反模？本文旨在通过构造反例来回答这个问题，澄清自反模理论中的一个基本概念。
AI.method: 作者通过构造具体的模论反例来证明存在2-自反模但不是自反模的情况。这种方法涉及模论中自反性的定义和性质分析。
AI.result: 成功构造了一个模，该模是2-自反的但不是自反的，从而证明了并非所有2-自反模都是自反模。
AI.conclusion: 本文解决了Auslander和Bridger提出的问题，证明了2-自反性不能推出自反性，这对模论中自反模的研究具有重要意义。

title: Quadratic exchange equations for Coxeter matroids
summary: Tropicalisation (with trivial coefficients) is a process that turns a polynomial equation into a combinatorial predicate on subsets of the set of variables. We show that for each minuscule representation of a simple reductive group, there is a set of quadratic equations cutting out the orbit of the highest weight vector whose tropicalisation characterises the set of Coxeter matroids for that representation which satisfy the strong exchange property.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了对于简单可约群的minuscule表示，存在一组二次方程，其热带化可以刻画满足强交换性质的Coxeter拟阵集合。
AI.motivation: 热带化是将多项式方程转化为变量子集上的组合谓词的过程。作者希望探索热带化与表示论、组合数学之间的联系，特别是minuscule表示与Coxeter拟阵之间的关系。
AI.method: 对于每个简单可约群的minuscule表示，作者构造了一组切割出最高权向量轨道的二次方程。然后对这些方程进行热带化处理，将其转化为组合条件。
AI.result: 证明了这些二次方程的热带化精确地刻画了满足强交换性质的Coxeter拟阵集合。这建立了代数几何（热带几何）与组合数学（拟阵理论）之间的深刻联系。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了minuscule表示、二次方程的热带化与Coxeter拟阵之间的对应关系，为理解这些数学结构之间的内在联系提供了新的视角。

title: Localization of valuations and Alesker's irreducibility theorem
comment: Added discussion for n=2 case, refined structure and corrected some typos. 66 pages. Comments and remarks welcome!
summary: We provide a new proof of Alesker's Irreducibility Theorem. We first introduce a new localization technique for polynomial valuations on convex bodies, which we use to independently prove that smooth and translation invariant valuations are representable by integration with respect to the normal cycle. This allows us to reduce the statement to a corresponding result for the representation of $\mathfrak{sl}(n)$ on the space of these differential forms.

AI.tldr: 本文提供了Alesker不可约定理的新证明，通过引入凸体上多项式赋值的局部化技术，证明了光滑平移不变赋值可由法丛上的积分表示，从而将问题约化为𝔰𝔩(𝑛)在这些微分形式空间上的表示问题。
AI.motivation: 为Alesker不可约定理提供新的证明方法，该定理在凸体理论和积分几何中具有重要意义。通过引入新的技术手段，希望简化证明过程并深化对该定理的理解。
AI.method: 1. 引入凸体上多项式赋值的新局部化技术；2. 独立证明光滑平移不变赋值可由法丛上的积分表示；3. 将问题约化为𝔰𝔩(𝑛)李代数在相应微分形式空间上的表示问题。
AI.result: 成功获得了Alesker不可约定理的新证明，建立了凸体上多项式赋值的局部化技术与李代数表示理论之间的联系。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入新的局部化技术，本文为Alesker不可约定理提供了更简洁的证明，并将凸体理论与李代数表示理论联系起来，为相关领域的研究提供了新视角。

title: Birational equivalence of exponential matrices
summary: In this article, we consider birational equivalence of exponential matrices. In characteristic zero, we give a birational classification of exponential matrices of size $n$-by-$n$ $(n \geq 2)$, which consists of two types. And in positive characteristic, we give birational classifications of exponential matrices of sizes two-by-two and three-by-three, respectively.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了指数矩阵的双有理等价性，在特征零条件下给出了n×n矩阵的双有理分类（分为两类），在正特征条件下分别给出了2×2和3×3指数矩阵的双有理分类。
AI.motivation: 研究指数矩阵的双有理等价性，旨在建立不同特征域（特征零和正特征）下指数矩阵的分类理论，为代数几何和矩阵理论提供新的分类框架。
AI.method: 采用双有理等价的方法，分别在特征零和正特征条件下分析指数矩阵。对于特征零情况，研究n×n矩阵的一般分类；对于正特征情况，分别处理2×2和3×3矩阵的具体分类问题。
AI.result: 1. 特征零条件下：证明了n×n指数矩阵（n≥2）的双有理分类由两种类型构成；2. 正特征条件下：分别给出了2×2和3×3指数矩阵的完整双有理分类。
AI.conclusion: 该论文成功建立了指数矩阵的双有理分类理论，在不同特征域下获得了具体的分类结果，为指数矩阵的代数几何研究提供了系统框架。

title: Total trades, intersection matrices and Specht modules
comment: 14 pages, to appear in Linear Algebra and Its Applications
summary: Trades are important objects in combinatorial design theory that may be realized as certain elements of kernels of inclusion matrices. Total trades were introduced recently by Ghorbani, Kamali and Khosravshahi, who showed that over a field of characteristic zero the vector space of trades decomposes into a direct sum of spaces of total trades. In this paper, we show that the vector space spanned by the permutations of a total trade is an irreducible representation of the symmetric group. As a corollary, the previous decomposition theorem is recovered. Also, a basis is obtained for the module of total trades in the spirit of Specht polynomials. More generally, in the second part of the paper we consider intersection matrices and determine the irreducible decompositions of their images. This generalizes previously known results concerning ranks of special cases.

title: Cluster structures via representation theory: cluster ensembles, tropical duality, cluster characters and quantisation
comment: 136 pages, comments welcome; v2: corrections and minor improvements
summary:
We develop a general theory of cluster categories, applying to a 2-Calabi-Yau extriangulated category $\mathcal{C}$ and cluster-tilting subcategory $\mathcal{T}$ satisfying only mild finiteness conditions. We show that the structure theory of $\mathcal{C}$ and the representation theory of $\mathcal{T}$ give rise to the rich combinatorial structures of seed data and cluster ensembles, via Grothendieck groups and homological algebra. We demonstrate that there is a natural dictionary relating cluster-tilting subcategories and their tilting theory to A-side tropical cluster combinatorics and, dually, relating modules over $\underline{\mathcal{T}}$ to the X-side; here $\underline{\mathcal{T}}$ is the image of $\mathcal{T}$ in the triangulated stable category of $\mathcal{C}$. Moreover, the exchange matrix associated to $\mathcal{T}$ arises from a natural map $p_{\mathcal{T}}\colon\mathrm{K}_0(\operatorname{mod}\underline{\mathcal{T}})\to\mathrm{K}_0(\mathcal{T})$ closely related to taking projective resolutions.
  Via our approach, we categorify many key identities involving mutation, g-vectors and c-vectors, including in infinite rank cases and in the presence of loops and 2-cycles. We are also able to define A- and X-cluster characters, which yield A- and X-cluster variables when there are no loops or 2-cycles, and which enable representation-theoretic proofs of cluster-theoretical statements.
  Continuing with the same categorical philosophy, we give a definition of a quantum cluster category, as a cluster category together with the choice of a map closely related to the adjoint of $p_{\mathcal{T}}$. Our framework enables us to show that any Hom-finite exact cluster category admits a canonical quantum structure, generalising results of Geiß--Leclerc--Schröer.

title: Exchange matrices of I-boxes
comment: v1 is 62 pages long. In v2, 66 pages with several changes
summary: Admissible chains of i-boxes are important combinatorial tools in the monoidal categorification of cluster algebras, as they provide seeds of the cluster algebra. In this paper, we explore the properties of maximal commuting families of i-boxes in a more general setting, and define a certain matrix associated with such a family, which we call the exchange matrix. It turns out that, when considering the cluster algebra structure on the Grothendieck rings, this matrix is indeed the exchange matrix of the seed associated with the family, both in certain categories of modules over quantum affine algebras and over quiver Hecke algebras. We prove this by constructing explicit short exact sequences that represent the mutation relations.

AI.motivation: i-box的可容许链是簇代数单子范畴化中的重要组合工具，它们提供了簇代数的种子。本文旨在更一般化的设定下探索i-box极大交换族的性质，并研究其关联矩阵在簇代数结构中的作用。
AI.method: 在更一般的设定下研究i-box极大交换族的性质，定义关联矩阵（称为交换矩阵）。通过构造表示突变关系的显式短正合序列来证明该矩阵确实是相应簇代数种子中的交换矩阵。
